name: Troll-Trasher
description:
A little arcadey shmup / bullet-hell game, where you take part in an epic internet argument with an annoying troll.

Controls: Left + Right arrows to move. Space to shoot!

Objective: Charge up one of the floating insults by shooting it. Make sure you finish charging it before the level ends. Oh, and dodge the incoming fire, too!

  • Code by Jason Davey
  • Audio by Efilheim
  • Art by Haiyoooo

Made for the Dream Arcade Archive jam!
